kgCO2/passenger-km: Carbon efficiency per passenger kilometer in aviation
kgCO2/vehicle-km: Carbon emissions per vehicle kilometer traveled
gCO₂/vehicle-km: grams of CO2 per vehicle kilometer
tCO₂e/$ mn Invested: tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent per million Singapore Dollars invested
tCO₂e/$ mn Revenue: tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent per million Singapore Dollars revenue
tCO₂/million SGD sales: tonnes of CO₂ per million Singapore dollars in sales
tCO₂/million SGD: tonnes of CO₂ per million Singapore dollars invested
tCO2e/ft²: Emissions per square foot, providing insight into carbon efficiency
kgCO₂e/m²: kilograms of CO2 equivalent per square meter
kgCO2/m²: kilograms of CO2 per square meter
kgCO₂/m²: kilograms of CO₂ per square meter
m³/Million: cubic meters per million Singapore dollars
kgCO2e/kg: Carbon emissions per kilogram of product or material
tCO2/tSteel: Carbon emissions per tonne of steel produced
MWh/ft²: Electricity used per square foot of operational space
m³/ft²: Water consumption per square foot of operational space
tCO₂/FTE: tonnes of CO₂ per full-time employee
MtCO2e: Million tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent
tCO2e: Measures carbon dioxide equivalent across various operational scopes
tonnes: Total weight of recycled waste, including electronic waste
